name: course_completed
definition: The event is emitted anytime a course module's completion requirements are met.
trigger: Triggered when all the module requirements of a course have been met. Also gets triggered when a module has a set completion time or when the completion time gets updated.

course.account_id: The local Canvas id of the course's account.
course.id: The local Canvas id of the course.
course.name: The name of the course.
course.sis_source_id: The SIS identifier for the course, if defined.

progress.completed_at: Timestamp when the course module progress item was completed.
progress.next_requirement_url: Next module item on the module requirements list. Typically is null if student meets all requirements but also could have a value if there are more optional requirements left on the list.
progress.requirement_completed_count: Count of those requirements that are done. E.g. 7 total, 5 completed.
progress.requirement_count: Count of all the requirements in the course as a number

user.id: The Canvas id of the student completing the course.
user.name: The name of the student.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
